config_description: GC Pauses greater than 200 ms will be logged at INFO level This threshold can be adjusted to minimize logging if necessary
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' sets a threshold for logging GC pauses greater than the specified time (200 ms) at INFO level. This threshold can be adjusted to control the amount of logging.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever a garbage collection event occurs and the pause time exceeds the specified threshold of 200 ms.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: Adjusting the 'gc_log_threshold_in_ms' configuration can impact the amount of logging generated by the system. Lowering the threshold may reduce the number of log entries related to GC pauses, while increasing it may result in more logging for longer pauses.
